lead_paragraph: The board was forced to remind voters of next week’s presidential primary after a confusing series of mailings to newly registered voters.

headline.print_headline: Elections Board Fixes Gaffe in Another Mass Mailing
headline.main: New York City Elections Board Fixes Gaffe in Another Mass Mailing

snippet: The board was forced to remind voters of next week’s presidential primary after a confusing series of mailings to newly registered voters.
abstract: New York City Board of Elections sends out postcards reminding more than 42,000 newly registered voters of next week's presidential primary; previous notices included incorrect information, and according to Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, could have misled eligible voters.
